returns._0: The hex color string, or "" if not set

setCustomColorsForMany(address,address,u.details: Caller must own all tokens. Validates hex format strictly.

params.diamondHex: Diamond color override ("#rrggbb" or "" to clear)
params.flameHex: Flame color override ("#rrggbb" or "" to clear)
params.outlineHex: Outline color override ("#rrggbb" or "" to clear)
params.squareHex: Square color override ("#rrggbb" or "" to clear)
params.tokenContract: The ERC721 contract address (must be in allowedToken list)
params.tokenIds: Array of token IDs to customize
params.user: The token owner (verified against ownerOf for each token)

setMyColors(address,string,string,string.details: Colors cascade: per-token override → owner default → referrer → upline → theme default

params.diamondHex: Diamond background color ("#rrggbb" lowercase, or "" to clear)
params.flameHex: Flame fill color ("#rrggbb" lowercase, or "" to clear)
params.outlineHex: Outline/border color ("#rrggbb" lowercase, or "" to clear)
params.squareHex: Square background color ("#rrggbb" lowercase, or "" to clear)
params.user: The address whose preferences to set (must match msg.sender in renderer)

returns._0: success Always true on success, reverts on invalid input

setTopAffiliateColor(address,address,uin.details: Only for affiliate trophy type tokens

params.trophyHex: Special trophy color ("#rrggbb" or "" to clear)

returns._0: The hex color string, or "" if not set
The hex color string, or "" if not set
The size as 1e6-scaled percentage (0 if not set)

setCustomColorsForMany(address,address,u.notice: Batch set per-token color overrides for multiple tokens

setMyColors(address,string,string,string.notice: Set the caller's default color preferences for all their tokens

setTopAffiliateColor(address,address,uin.notice: Set the special color for a top affiliate trophy

topAffiliateColor(address,uint256).notice: Read the top affiliate special color

trophyOuter(address,uint256).notice: Read the trophy outer ring size override
